column2: The carmaker Avtovaz, in which Renault has a controlling stake, sold 350,000 vehicles in 2021, not “nearly 2,900” as an article said (Renault car factory in Moscow restarts production, 22 March, p33).  We again misspelled the town of Livingston, in Scotland, by presuming that it wanted an “e” on the end (Boy, 7, petitions Scottish parliament over waste, 10 March, p23).  Other recently amended articles include: Former boyfriend who kidnapped Angel Lynn has sentence increased Editorial complaints and correction requests can be sent to: guardian.readers@theguardian.com. You can also write to: Readers’ editor, Kings Place, 90 York Way, London N1 9GU, or leave a voicemail on +44 (0) 20 3353 4736.
